thread.title: Manchester United fans react to an easy win in the Europa League
thread.title_full: Manchester United fans react to an easy win in the Europa League

title: Manchester United fans react to an easy win in the Europa League
text:
Man United fans react to an easy win in the Europa League and THAT red card By Rebecca Knight on Wednesday, February 22, 2017 All done 
Manchester United sailed through to the next round of the Europa League, and after winning the first leg 3-0, you may have thought Jose Mourinho would rest some players. 
He didn’t, and sent out a full strength team, right before the EFL Cup final and a packed fixture schedule. 
It worked, with an early goal putting the tie totally to bed – but it came at a cost. 
Goal scorer Henrikh Mkhitaryan went off injured, with a suspected hamstring issue, and Eric Baily managed to get himself sent off to boot – meaning ten men had to work even harder – when most people thought they’d be taking it easy. 
It was a mixed bag on Twitter, with some people happy, some annoyed and most not really caring – even on a Wednesday night! The best of Twitter I think @ManUtd will win 3 this Season. But 1 #PL Title will be belonged to @ChelseaFC .
